verses.text: \w Of|strong="H3068"\w* understanding \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w A|strong="H7121"\w* prayer \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cave. [1 Kings 24]

\w I|strong="H3559"\w* cried \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w with|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* voice: \w with|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* voice \w I|strong="H3559"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* supplication \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sight \w I|strong="H3068"\w* pour \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trouble:
\w When|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w spirit|strong="H3820"\w* failed \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w then|strong="H0376"\w* thou newest \w my|strong="H5186"\w* paths.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* looked \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H6662"\w* hand, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* beheld, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* there \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H7451"\w* know \w me|strong="H1986"\w*. Flight hath failed \w me|strong="H1986"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* there \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w one|strong="H6662"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath regard \w to|strong="H5750"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* soul.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* cried \w to|strong="H8085"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*: Thou art \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hope, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* portion \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* living.

Attend \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* supplication: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* am brought \w very|strong="H6106"\w* \w low|strong="H0776"\w*. Deliver \w me|strong="H3644"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* persecutors; \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* stronger than \w I|strong="H0776"\w*.

Bring \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* prison, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0408"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* thy name: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* just wait \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, until thou reward \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.
